edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Jedi, Player

    public abstract class Person
extends Object
implements Serializable
    (@link Person) is the superclass of (@link Player) and (@link Jedi) that has the field (@link #location). Also contains methods (@link #move()), (@link #die()), and (@link #getLocation()).
    Author:
    Team Jedi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int[] location
      (@link location) is a location on an x and y grid, where x is index 0 and y is the index 1.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      This is the default serial ID of the Person class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Person(int x, int y)
      The person constructor will put the integer (@link x) into location[0] and the integer (@link y) into location[1].

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person(int x,
      int y)
        The person constructor will put the integer (@link x) into location[0] and the integer (@link y) into location[1]. This represents a location as a x and y coordinate.
